name: ZEST TECHNOLOGIES DIFC LIMITED
description: Operator of an investment services platform intended to democratize access to venture, empowering investors, founders, and their companies on one platform. The company's platform gives access to secondary investing for businesses by filling a gap by offering investors an accessible entry point to this attractive asset class with a platform that automates the overall transaction process, enabling businesses to take part in investment activity smoothly.
one_liner: Operator of an investment services platform intended to democratize access to venture, empowering investors, founders, and their companies on one platform. The company's platform gives access to secondary investing for businesses by filling a gap by offering investors an accessible entry point to this attractive asset class with a platform that automates the overall transaction process, enabling businesses to take part in investment activity smoothly.
